title: Soul Snatcher
description:
My special guest is Blaine Pardoe and his daughter Victoria Hester here to discuss unsolved murders along the Colonial Parkway.

Enjoy the AD-FREE versions of our latest episodes and our archives right now.



Visit our home on the web: https://www.mysteriousradio.com

Follow us on Instagram @mysteriousradio
Follow us on TikTok mysteriousradioTikTok
Follow us on Twitter @mysteriousradio
